ing: 1 (3 ounce) package lemon flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "This molded salad has delicious cinnamon-apple accents, and is incredibly simple to make."
ins: In a large bowl, dissolve candies in boiling water.  Add gelatin and stir until dissolved.  Stir in applesauce and a few ice cubes and chill for 3 hours, or until set.  Serve cold with whipped cream.
